name: Esteemed Visitor
summary: Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers’ trust.
description:
Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers’ trust. While you are in a settlement, when you roll a critical failure on a Diplomacy check to Gather Information or Make an Impression, you get a failure instead.Traits

Shoony: Note from Nethys: no description was provided for this trait
